data.quote: You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.
data.author: Gandhi

data.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
data.author: E. E. Cummings

data.quote: Great minds have great purposes, others have wishes. Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: The start is what stops most people.
data.author: Don Shula

data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you desing for the present.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Small aim is a crime.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: There are a number of women who have brought about immense change in society.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: My 2020 Vision for India is to transform it into a developed nation. That cannot be abstract; it is a lifeline.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: My view is that at a younger age your optimism is more and you have more imagination etc. You have less bias.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Nations consist of people. And with their effort, a nation can accomplish all it could ever want.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: For success of any mission, it is necessary to have creative leadership. Creative leadership is vital for government, non-governmental organisations as well as for industries.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: I was a disadvantaged child from a non-educated family, yet I had the advantage of being in the company of great teachers.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
